ModMetaData.name: Luxe Fur
ModMetaData.author: lime_time (trublucaribou)
ModMetaData.description:
A tweak to the types of leather dropped by certain animals. Coarse fur will drop from the most basic small animals. It provides a semi-soft, furry bedding. Soft fur will drop from "cute" and "soft" mammals, with Luxe Fur dropping from the softest of all. The furs scale in warmth, value, and softness.
This mod is not meant to be used alone. It was created because of Soft Warm Beds, and patches several other animal mods, including: Vanilla Animals Expanded: Australia, Vanilla Animals Exapnded: Tropical Rainforest, Vanilla Animals Expanded: Boreal Forest, Erin's Critters, Forest Critters, FoxSquirrel, and Rodents of Unusual Size.
